H0.text: where is the majority of phosphorous stored in the environment. Oceans

H1.text: where is the majority of phosphorous stored in the environment. Soil

H2.text: where is the majority of phosphorous stored in the environment. Sediments

H3.text: where is the majority of phosphorous stored in the environment. rocks

A6.text: Phosphorus comprises about 0.1% by mass of the Earth's crust.

A7.text: Inorganic phosphate rock, which is partially made of apatite, is today the chief commercial source of this element.
